name: Prototype collections
description:
A collection of old RPG Maker project/prototypes, abandoned a long time ago. Includes

  • Tower - an image-based First Person Dungeon RPG made with the original RPG Maker 2003 (i.e. no easy management of pictures and QOL upgrades brought by the Western Release)
  • Holy Whale -  A puzzle game in which the player must find how to summon the Holy Whale and save the world. You can download the assets here: https://gamedevalliance.itch.io/1bit-pack-donut
  • LDVHLH - A RPG Maker XP version of "Choose your own Adventure" books.
  • Project 1&2 - Two mini-games made with RPG Maker XP. One is an escape room game, the other is a catching butterflies game.
  • Squashy - A pico-8 mini-game made with the tutorial from the fanzine.

These are all prototypes and aren't finished. Tower and Holy Whale are playable to a certain extent. LDVHLH only contains rules. Minigames are buggy (they were my first games!).
